Articles.Content:
What is your favourite place in KSP? Kerbin, Kerbol, Minmus or the Mun?

Any specific place on the surface of your favourite? (Assuming it\'s not Kerbol of course)

I\'m thinking Minmus for me. It\'s just so unique and differant then the Mun. The methane lakes and mountains are a really nice touch, along with the low gravity.

How can you choose? (Mun over KSC2, early morning on Mun with the sun lighting the western crater wall while the crater floor below lingers in darkness yet, and late afternoon on a cliff overlooking the southern arm of Minmus\' largest sea.)

Hard choice, I agree. I had a hard time picking Minmus over the Mun.

Nice screenshots by the way. Especially that last one, and the KSC2 one.
For stark and desolate beauty, it\'s gotta be the Mun!

Lol you spelled Kerbal wrong. But my favorite place is Minmus because It\'s easy to get to and its worth getting there. The only thing that isn\'t cool is the fact that it doesn\'t have \'EasterEggs\'. Like the Mun, it had both the Mun Arch, also in a different version of the game it had a Kerbal Space Center on it.

Lol you spelled Kerbal wrong. But my favorite place is Minmus because It\'s easy to get to and its worth getting there. The only thing that isn\'t cool is the fact that it doesn\'t have \'EasterEggs\'. Like the Mun, it had both the Mun Arch, also in a different version of the game it had a Kerbal Space Center on it.

I was under the impression that there was a monolith on Minmus, at least I thought so.

I was under the impression that there was a monolith on Minmus, at least I thought so.

I am told it is some distance hanging above the surface.
Mun. Its geological features are ar more interesting than minmus
I like Minmus\' cyan shade and the isolated, idyllic feel of it. You also get nice views of Kerbin and the Moon.
Minmus. I can ramp my Kiwicycle off its mountains and not have to worry too much about the impact of falling. 8)

Lol you spelled Kerbal wrong.

When did he ever mention Kerbals?

For me, it\'d have to be Minmus. Such a unique location, and makes for some fun roving.
Low orbit around the Mun is my favourite place.. looks great at sunrise

Lol you spelled Kerbal wrong. But my favorite place is Minmus because It\'s easy to get to and its worth getting there. The only thing that isn\'t cool is the fact that it doesn\'t have \'EasterEggs\'. Like the Mun, it had both the Mun Arch, also in a different version of the game it had a Kerbal Space Center on it.

When I said Kerbol, I was referring to the star.

http://184.154.141.114/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Kerbol

Also, I\'m fairly sure Minmus has a monolith. I seem to remember seeing it floating above the surface in another thread.
The Mun for sure because it was the first place I set my sites on going. It will always hold a special place in my eyes.
I vote Minmus. Some of the landscapes are just purely awesome

I love the North pole of the mun it just looks so cool with 4km high mountains Too bad every time i land there i die :\'(

Also i failed the most getting to the mun so it holds a special place to me
